info.title: Dynamics 365 Customer Insights
info.description: The Dynamics 365 Customer Insights connector provides a set of APIs to interact with Dynamics 365 Customer Insights instances.

get.summary: Triggers a flow from the data source when refresh is completed
get.description: This operation triggers a flow from the data source when refresh is completed in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, select the data source and refresh in Customer Insight UI

get.summary: Triggers a flow from the data source when refresh is failed
get.description: This operation triggers a flow from the data source when refresh is failed in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, select the data source and refresh in Customer Insight UI. Will trigger if datasource refresh is failed.

get.summary: Triggers a flow when a segment threshold is crossed
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a segment threshold is crossed in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights.

get.summary: Triggers a flow when a business measure threshold is crossed
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a business measure threshold is crossed in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights.

get.summary: Triggers a flow when a full refresh of Customer Insights is completed
get.description: This operation triggers a flow when a full refresh of Customer Insights (data sources, segments, measures,...) is completed.

get.summary: Triggers a flow when a process in Customer Insights is completed
get.description: A flow is triggered for scheduled refreshes of selected process. Additionally, you can choose to trigger a flow for manual refreshes.

parameters.name: includingManualRefreshes
parameters.description: Select yes if manually triggered process should be included.

get.description: Retrieve partitions for an entity.

get.summary: Retrieve partitions for an entity V2
get.description: Retrieve partitions for an entity V2.

parameters.name: partitionDisplayName
parameters.description: The partitionDisplayName value to filter for.
parameters.x-ms-summary: The partitionDisplayName value to filter for

get.description: Retrieve data from a partition.

parameters.name: partitionUri
parameters.description: The reference (URI or Name) of the partition.
parameters.x-ms-summary: The reference (URI or Name) of the partition

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: A comma separated line of columns.
parameters.x-ms-summary: A comma separated line of columns

parameters.name: offsetStart
parameters.description: Position from where to start reading, in bytes.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Position from where to start reading, in bytes

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Maximum number of records to return

get.description: Lists tables for GET.
Lists tables for POST.
Lists tables for PATCH.
Lists business measures.
Lists segments.

get.summary: Lists entities available for data lake retrieval
get.description: Lists entities available for data lake retrieval.
This operation gets the metadata for an entity
This operation gets all instances available to the connection.
This operation gets entities from an instance

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

get.description:
This operation gets items from an entity. Depending on the entity, fields can be defined as filters:

- UnifiedActivity entity: ActivityId and CustomerId fields
- Customer entity: CustomerId field and any other fields indexed in the Customer Insights instance
- Any other entities: CustomerId field.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

post.description: This operation creates an item on an entity

get.description: This operation gets an item from an entity

patch.description: This operation updates an item on an entity

ErrorCode.description: The error code during data refresh.

StartTimeUtc.description: The start time for data refresh

EndTimeUtc.description: The end time for data refresh

EntityCount.description: The actual count of segment members

ValueDisplayName.description: The display name of the value

FullRefreshProcessData.description: The information about executed full refresh

StartTime.description: The start time of the workflow step

EndTime.description: The end time of the workflow step

Duration.description: The duration of the process in minutes

Status.description: The status of the workflow step

StatusPage.description: The link to the status page

StartTime.description: The start time of the workflow step

EndTime.description: The end time of the workflow step

Duration.description: The duration of the process in minutes

Status.description: The status of the workflow step

StatusPage.description: The link to the status page

Name.description: The name of the table. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the table.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional table properties provided by the connector to the clients.

Header.description: Header containing the attributes of the entity

Items.description:
The dictionary containing data of maximum 'Size' items from a 
            partition, from offset 'OffsetStart' to 'OffsetEnd'.

serverPagingOptions.description: List of supported server-driven paging capabilities

sortable.description: Indicates whether this table has sortable columns

ascendingOnlyProperties.description: List of properties which support ascending order only

filterable.description: Indicates whether this table has filterable columns

selectable.description: Indicates whether this table has selectable columns

PassThroughNativeQuery.description: static schema for pass-through native query execution
